subtitle: Get the best market rates on your car, property and credit insurance.
featuresSubtitle: We guarantee you the best rates on your car, property and credit insurance.
carInsuranceText: Submit all the data about your vehicle, your driving habits and we'll take care of the rest.
houseInsuranceText: We assure you the best market rate on your home insurance.
creditInsuranceText: We have been obtaining better credit insurance rates than most of our competitors for several years.
travelInsuranceText: Go on vacation with peace of mind and save money thanks to our travel insurance, which is one of the most competitive on the market.
testimonySubtitle: Our customers, loyal or new, have something to tell you that could convince you to submit a quote on one of our insurance policies.
faqSubtitle: Do not hesitate to contact us if you cannot find your answer.
question1: Do you have the best rates?
question2: I fear that my transmitted data will be collected and then resold..
question3: My password is lost, what should I do?
answer1: Absolutely, our algorithm is the most efficient ever used on the market, combined with a new AI developed by our partner AI3000.
answer2: We assure all our customers without exception that the data collected is stored securely.
answer3: Contact us and we'll send you a link to set up a new password.
connectText: Do not have an account yet? Register to get a quote.
signInQuestion: How did you hear about us?

primaryFeatures.title: Car Insurance
primaryFeatures.description: Submit all the data about your vehicle, your driving habits, and we'll take care of the rest.

primaryFeatures.description: Travel peacefully and save money with our highly competitive travel insurance policies in the market.

testimonials.content: By far the best insurance rates on the internet.
I recommend ZeroRisk with my eyes closed, the best insurance rates on the market.
I do not count the savings made thanks to the unbeatable rates that ZeroRisk offers.

faqs.question: Do you have the best rates?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, our algorithm is the most powerful ever used in the market, combined with a new AI developed by our partner IA3000.

faqs.question: I'm concerned that my transmitted data will be collected and resold.
faqs.answer: We assure all our clients without exception that the collected data is stored securely.

faqs.question: I have lost my password, what should I do?
faqs.answer: Contact us, and we will send you a link to set up a new password.
